### Speakers  
Megan Brewster (Former Senior Science Policy Advisor, OSTP)

Megan Brewster, former senior science policy advisor at OSTP, spoke about her career trajectory in the field of science policy: she has worked on advanced manufacturing at the White House, US Department of Energy, and the Senate committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
